snippet: “Planetfall” is a delightful up-to-date album of our solar system using images from NASA and European Space Agency missions from 2000 to 2012.
abstract: Dana Jennings reviews book Planetfall: New Solar System Visions by Michael Benson.
lead_paragraph: “Planetfall” is a delightful up-to-date album of our solar system using images from NASA and European Space Agency missions from 2000 to 2012.

headline.print_headline: A Scrapbook of Our Relationship With the Universe
headline.seo: Michael Benson’s ‘Planetfall’ Offers a Scrapbook of Space Exploration
headline.main: A Scrapbook of Our Relationship With the Universe
